subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Nose tackle Kris Jenkins arrived at training camp weighing 359 pounds, a 33.6-pound drop from May, and beat Rex Ryan and Damien Woody in the challenge.
snippet: Nose tackle Kris Jenkins arrived at training camp weighing 359 pounds, a 33.6-pound drop from May, and beat Rex Ryan and Damien Woody in the challenge.
